text: North Mundham and Tangmere is an electoral ward of Chichester District, West Sussex, England and returns two members to sit on Chichester District Council. Following a district boundary review, North Mundham and Tangmere was created from the North Mundham, Tangmere and Sidlesham wards in 2019. ==Councillors== {| class="wikitable" |- !colspan="3"|Year!!Member!!Party!!Member!!Party |- |style="background-color: " | || style="background-color: " | |2019 |Simon Oakley ||Conservative |Christopher Page ||Conservative |} ==Election results== :* Elected ==References== ==External links== * Chichester District Council * Election Maps Category:Wards of Chichester District
title: North Mundham and Tangmere
